remarks.para: Except for ER operations, may be inoperative provided APU is considered inoperative.

note.para: Additional deferral required – Auxiliary Power Unit (APU).
An auto-generated ACARS message requesting an inflight APU start should be disregarded.

placard.para: Placard near APU Fire Handle "APU FIRE BOTTLE INOP" as appropriate and enter item in Aircraft Deferred Item Log.
